评论概述: Comfortable and Stylish, but Material is a Bit Thin
评论详情: The Ryannology Men's Linen Henley 3/4 Sleeve Casual Cotton T-Shirt is a stylish addition to my wardrobe. The design is versatile and can be dressed up or down, making it great for various occasions. The regular fit is comfortable and allows for easy movement, perfect for casual outings.  However, I did notice that the material is a bit thin. While this makes it breathable and ideal for warmer weather, it might not be as durable as some thicker options. I’d recommend wearing an undershirt if you prefer a little extra coverage.  Overall, it’s a great shirt for casual wear, especially in the spring and summer months. If you're looking for something lightweight and stylish, this shirt delivers well!

I really like the shirt, it looks nice. But unfortunately it has a slight formaldehyde smell.  I have run into this with clothes from China that I have bought from Amazon. Washed it once with some linen cotton pants I also bought and smelled the same.  I've worked around formaldehyde so I know it's smell and the burning sensation in my sinuses. First wash, no change with just detergent. After researching, I used detergent and a half cup of baking soda, just the pants I mentioned and the shirt, large load and extra rinse. The smell will transfer to other clothing if you add them. Then I air dried them. It seems to have helped.

I love these shirts. I have a bunch in several different colors. The fit and feel are perfect, as always. However, the pink in the pictures is not the pink I got. The pink in the pictures is a faded, pastel pink. The pink I got was much more of a vivid salmon, saturated color with some orange to it. It doesn’t really fit the feel of the beachy yoga shirt I wanted. I’m going to do what I can to fade it out to the color I was hoping for, the color in the listing’s pictures.  Again, though, the shirts themselves are great. I know some folks don’t like how “wrinkled” they look. If you’re looking for a wrinkleless shirt, don’t buy one made of cotton and linen. That said, they don’t hold wrinkles any longer than anything else. The fabric is thick enough that most wrinkles will fall out of it after a few minutes of wear. But it’s thin enough to be comfy in warm weather. If you’re looking for a casual, comfy, and fashionable shirt in this style, look no further. If you’re looking for a plastic shirt that can be wadded up in a suitcase and then thrown on with a suit and tie and be wrinkle-free, keep on scrolling. But why would you be looking for that kind of shirt in a yoga shirt listing?
